title: Don’t use vodka to sanitise hands – it probably won’t protect you from coronavirus and could damage your skin – The Scottish Sun
content: However, experts have warned against making your own DIY hand sanitisers. That's because the actual percentage of alcohol might not be enough to kill off viruses, including Covid-19.
warning: Based on the content, title, language and advertisements on this page, it can be assumed that this page is credible!
